trans-unit.source: jQuery Setup
Versions in use: %s
You are using CDN to integrate the jQuery-Libs, there are no further settings.
Create custom jQuery JS library
Analyze .js for jQuery dependencies
Process & Analyze t3jquery.txt in extensions
Compress your own javascript file
Display class.t3jquery.php API
jQuery dependencies found in file:
None
File is either not ending in .js or file is compressed with Packer!
trans-unit.target: Datei endet nicht auf .js oder ist bereits komprimiert!

trans-unit.source: Check
Compress
Create jQuery Library
Merge & Use
Select all
Deselect all
Use
Paste in your UNCOMPRESSED javascript into this field:
A COMPRESSED version of your javascript will appear in this field.
This module can be used for compressing your own javascript file(s), using the same compression (Packer or JsMin) used for compressing the jQuery library.
trans-unit.target: Durch dieses Modul wird die Möglichkeit zur Verfügung gestellt, eigene JavaScript-Dateien zu komprimieren. Verwendet wird die PHP5-version von Dean Edwards Packer oder JSMin.

trans-unit.source: Minify only:
Yes
No
Choose compression type
Cleans comments and whitespace, Compression by JSMin.
trans-unit.target: Säubert Kommentare und Leerzeichen, Kompression mit JSMin.

trans-unit.source: JsMin Compression
Uncompressed, removes only documentation
No Documentation
Full Source, includes documentation. Recommended while testing & building.
trans-unit.target: Unkomprimiert, inklusive Dokumentation. Empfehlenswert während der Entwicklung.

trans-unit.source: No Compression
Uses the php5 version of Dean Edwards Packer.
trans-unit.target: Verwendet die PHP5-Version von Dean Edwards Packer.

trans-unit.source: Packer Compression
jQuery dependencies found selected extensions:
Select the extensions you want processed and checked for jQuery dependencies.
trans-unit.target: Extensions auswählen, die auf jQuery-Abhängigkeiten geprüft werden sollen.

trans-unit.source: Extension Key:
Title:
Version:
Choose the jQuery Components you need:
Find the jQuery Components you need
Find the jQuery Components you need
Compress your own javascript file
Display class.t3jquery.php API
Select the uncompressed Javascript file you want to check for jQuery dependencies.
trans-unit.target: Unkomprimiertes JavaScript auswählen, das auf jQuery-Abhängigkeiten geprüft werden soll.

trans-unit.source: or Local file:

Note: Only files with the extension .js is accepted.
Local extension dirs can be accessed using EXT:. ie. EXT:t3jquery/res/jqconfig.js
trans-unit.target:
Achtung: Nur Dateien mit .js werden akzeptiert.
Extension-Verzeichnisse können mit EXT: abgerufen werden. zB. EXT:t3jquery/res/jqconfig.js

trans-unit.source: Remote file:
The jQuery, required for UI Core.
Activates the noConflict mode of jQuery to work with other JS-Frameworks
The core of jQuery UI, required for all interactions and widgets.
trans-unit.target: Die Basis des jQuery-UI. Erforderlich für alle Interaktionen und Widgets.

trans-unit.source: Core utility for building UI controls.
Track and handle mouse-based interactions.
trans-unit.target: Mouse, für alle Interaktionen mit der Maus erforderlich.

trans-unit.source: Place elements at specific locations in relation to other elements.
Makes any element on the page draggable.
trans-unit.target: Macht alle Elemente einer Seite ziehbar.

trans-unit.source: Generated drop targets for draggable elements.
Makes any element on the page resizable.
trans-unit.target: Macht alle Elemente einer Seite in der Größe veränderbar.

trans-unit.source: Makes a list of elements mouse selectable by dragging a box or clicking on them.
trans-unit.target: Macht eine Liste mit Elementen durch die Maus auswählbar, indem man einen Rahmen aufzieht oder darauf klickt.

trans-unit.source: Makes a list of items sortable.
trans-unit.target: Macht eine Liste mit Einträgen sortierbar.

trans-unit.source: Creates an accordion navigation widget.
Autocomplete, added to an input field, enables users to quickly find and select from a pre-populated list of values as they type, leveraging searching and filtering.
Button enhances standard form elements like button, input of type submit or reset or anchors to themable buttons with appropiate mouseover and active styles.
Opens existing markup in a draggable and resizable dialog.
trans-unit.target: Öffnet vorhandenes Markup in einem ziehbaren und in der Größe veränderbaren Dialog.

trans-unit.source: A flexible slider with ranges and accessibility via keyboard.
trans-unit.target: Ein flexible Regler mit Begrenzungen auf dem mit der Tastatur zugegriffen werden kann.

trans-unit.source: Transforms a set of container elements into a tab structure.
trans-unit.target: Transformiert ein Set mit Containerelementen in eine Tabstruktur.

trans-unit.source: A datepicker that can be toggled from an input or displayed inline.
A status indicator that can be used for a loading state and standard percentage indicators.
trans-unit.target: Ein Statusindikator. Er kann für den Ladefortschritt oder als Prozentindikator benutzt werden.

trans-unit.source: Extends the internal jQuery effects, includes morphing, easing and is required by all other effects.
Blinds the element.
Bounces an element horizontally or vertically n-times.
trans-unit.target: Das Element hüpft n-mal horizontal oder vertikal.

trans-unit.source: Clips the element on and off like an old TV.
trans-unit.target: Schaltet ein Element, wie einen alten Fernsehr, an und aus.

trans-unit.source: A Drop out effect by moving the element in one direction and hiding it at the same time.
The element explodes in all directions into n pieces. Also supports imploding again.
trans-unit.target: Das Element explodiert nach allen Richtungen in n Stücken. Es kann auch wieder implodieren.

trans-unit.source: The element will fades in or out.
trans-unit.target: Das Element wird ein- oder ausgeblendet.

trans-unit.source: Folds the element first horizontally and then vertically.
trans-unit.target: Faltet das Element erst horizontal und dann vertikal.

trans-unit.source: Highlights the background of the element in a defined color for a custom duration.
trans-unit.target: Hebt den Hintergrund des Elements in einer definierten Farbe für eine bestimmte Zeit hervor.

trans-unit.source: The element pulsates n times by changing the opacity to zero and back.
trans-unit.target: Das Element pulsiert n-mal durch Veränderung der Transparenz.

trans-unit.source: Grow or shrink any element and it's content and restore it again.
trans-unit.target: Beliebige Elemente und ihren Inhalt wachsen oder schrumpfen lassen und wiederherstellen.

trans-unit.source: Shakes the element horizontally or vertically n times.
trans-unit.target: Bewegt das Element n-mal horizontal oder vertikal hin und her (Schütteleffekt).

trans-unit.source: The element slides in and out of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Das Element wird in den sichtbaren Fensterbereich hinein und heraus bewegt.

trans-unit.source: Transfer effect from one element to another.
trans-unit.target: Übergangseffekt von einem Element zu einem anderen.

trans-unit.source: A jQuery plugin to give advanced easing options.
jQuery Lint works over the top of jQuery and diligently reports errors and any incorrect usage of jQuery. It will also, to some extent, offer guidance on best practices and performance concerns.
The most important UI widget on the web
Transforms tabs into a working slideshow
The ability to navigate through tabs with the browser's back and forward buttons
The second most important UI widget on the web.
A sliding tooltip effect with customized sliding directions, dimensions and speeds
Dynamic positioning of the tooltip so that it always stays in the viewport
A generic HTML scrolling widget
Makes an infinite loop from the scrollable items so that there is no beginning or end
Makes the scrolling behaviour automatic. highly configurable
Provides navigation buttons for switching between pages in scrollable
Enables mousewheel support for scrollable
A generic HTML overlaying widget
A plugin for creating "lightbox" style image galleries
An overlay effect that you have seen on apple.com
HTML5 date input for humans
HTML5 range input for humans
HTML5 input validation for humans
The future of Flash embedding. Works as a standalone tool and jQuery is not required. flowplayer.js contains this script.
Back button for AJAX apps
Makes your HTML stand out from its surroundings
A generic mousewheel support for jQuery
The JavaScript component of Flowplayer - the Video player for the Web
Generate video controls with HTML and CSS
Generate video playlists with HTML and CSS
Generates embedding codes for Flowplayer
